string-array.name: biologynew_title
string-array.item: Biologia tutkii eliökuntaa.\n\n Meaning:Biology is studying the organism.
Kasvitiede jakautuu useihin haaroihin.\n\n Meaning: Botany/Plant science is divided into several branches:
Ihmisen, mutta myös eläimen terveys on vaarassa.\n\n Meaning:Human health is at risk, clearly, but so too is animal health.
Kissa on eläin\n\n Meaning:The cat is an animal
Puu on kasvi.\n\n Meaning: Tree is a plant.
Pian on taas yksi loinen lisää. \n\n Meaning: This is how they reproduce. - Second adult parasite in minutes.
Pohjoismaisissa metsissä on useita kasvilajeja, joilla on vahapintaiset siemenet.\n\n Meaning: In the Nordic forests, there are a great many species of plant which have waxed seeds.
Jos kaikki menee hyvin, minulla on pian rokote. \n\n Meaning:If all goes well we\'ll have a vaccine soon.
Bakteerit ovat juuston valmistuksessa välttämättömiä.\n\n Meaning:Bacteria are necessary to make cheese.
